### Becoming a member
:::

#### Individual Members 

:::{.members-category-container}
:::{.members-category}
Become a member of the OSC if you want to visibly support the goal of open, responsible, and reproducible research within your disciplines or at LMU Munich more broadly. As a member, you can
<ul>
  <li>shape our activities (e.g. suggest or lead an event, write research practice guidance, organise a meetup, liaise with stakeholders to inform on the design of incentives and policies)</li>
  <li>network with like-minded researchers across disciplines (from networking lunch to writing meta research proposals together), and </li>
  <li>vote and/or take part in the [OSC Scientific Board](../people/scientific-board.qmd).</li>
</ul>

According to its [statute](statutes.qmd), all PhD holders (post docs, lecturers, PDs, and Professors) of LMU Munich as well as researchers from other universities or non-university research institutes contributing to foster the goals of the OSC can become members - free of any charge, of course.

<a href="mailto:malika.ihle@lmu.de?subject=OSC%20Memberhip" class="social-link">
  Become an OSC Member <i class="bi bi-arrow-right"></i>
</a>
:::
:::  

#### OSC Fellows

:::{.members-category-container}
:::{.members-category}
Become an OSC Fellow if you are a PhD candidate or a student from LMU Munich wanting to contribute to the OSC's activities. For instance, you will be recognised with the status of OSC Fellow if you (co-)lead a grassroot initiatives, (co-)organise an event, and/or (co-)deliver a workshop, on your own or with OSC staff or members. The OSC strives to provide [OSC Fellows](../people/fellows.qmd) with further leadership or training opportunities.

<a href="mailto:malika.ihle@lmu.de?subject=OSC%20Fellowship" class="social-link">
  Become an OSC Fellow <i class="bi bi-arrow-right"></i>
</a>

:::
:::   

#### Institutional Members

:::{.members-category-container}
:::{.members-category}
Departments, faculties, units, or central institutions of the LMU that provide infrastructure or other services that facilitate the goals of the OSC can become [institutional members](../partners/institutional_members.html). Learn more about the benefits of becoming a funding institutional member below and schedule a call with us!

<a href="../partners/becoming_institutional_members.html" class="social-link">Learn more <i class="bi bi-arrow-right"></i></a>
